overview:
John Yii spent over 10 years at Microsoft where he managed projects for Windows XP, MSN Money Central, Microsoft Passport, and the MSN Data warehouse and advertising engines. John also served as the Director of Operations and Group Program Manager for Fidesic Corporation. There he led the design, development, and deployment of the companyâ€™s flagship electronic invoice presentment and payment (EIPP) service for businesses.

John holds a Bachelor of Mathematics in Computer Science from the University of Waterloo. He is a Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) and a Project Management Professional (PMP).
